name: part_007
file: tmp_【ゲスト／ときのそら＆雪花ラミィ】歌って笑って♪ウィンターminiライブ #ノムlive【燦鳥ノムpresents】 [FXCO0xHl8R4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: The VTubers drink their beverages and give initial reactions for the 'Drink Wolf' game.
Yukihana Lamy draws a gobi (sentence ending) card and reveals it's 'Nekketsu' (Hot-blooded).
The group enters 'thinking time' while strictly adhering to the hot-blooded persona and using forced sentence endings.
Voting for the wolf and the final reveal of what each person was drinking.

subtitles.original: 行きましょう！
subtitles.english: Let's go!

subtitles.original: はい！
subtitles.english: Yes!

subtitles.original: せーの、乾杯！
subtitles.english: One, two, cheers!

subtitles.original: あ、これは。飲みやすい喉越し。
subtitles.english: Oh, this... It goes down very smoothly.

subtitles.original: じゃあ、ラミィちゃんにカードを引いていただきましょうか。
subtitles.english: Well then, shall we have Lamy-chan draw a card?

subtitles.original: あ、はい、引きます。
subtitles.english: Ah, yes, I'll draw.

subtitles.original: じゃあ今のうちにそらちゃん、何でした？
subtitles.english: In the meantime, Sora-chan, what was it?

subtitles.original: 言えないよ！言ったらだめだよ！ゲームにならないよ。
subtitles.english: I can't say! You can't say it! The game will be ruined.

subtitles.original: はい、ラミィちゃん、おかえりなさい。では、ラミィちゃん、どんな語尾か発表してください。
subtitles.english: Okay, Lamy-chan, welcome back. Now, Lamy-chan, please announce your gobi.

subtitles.original: はい！次の語尾は...熱血！
subtitles.english: Yes! The next gobi is... Hot-blooded!

subtitles.original: 熱血？熱血？
subtitles.english: Hot-blooded? Hot-blooded?

subtitles.original: 熱血の...語尾というか、これはキャラじゃないですかね。
subtitles.english: Hot-blooded... rather than a gobi, isn't that more like a character?

subtitles.original: 熱血キャラ！熱血キャラ！
subtitles.english: A hot-blooded character! Hot-blooded character!

subtitles.original: 行くぞー！おい！おら行くぞー！
subtitles.english: Let's go! Hey! Whoa, here I go!

subtitles.original: スッキリだぜ！
subtitles.english: I'm refreshed, daze!

subtitles.original: そうですね。ちょっと戻ってますよ。
subtitles.english: That's right. You've reverted a bit.

subtitles.original: 戻ってますよ。何を飲んだんだ！？
subtitles.english: You've reverted! What on earth did you drink!?

subtitles.original: えーっと、熱血の方の一人称って何なんでしょうか。
subtitles.english: Um, what would be the first-person pronoun for a hot-blooded person?

subtitles.original: あ、そういうこと？えーっと、熱血になればいいんだ！
subtitles.english: Oh, I see. Well, as long as you're hot-blooded!

subtitles.original: そうですよ！語尾、熱血っぽければいいんですよ。
subtitles.english: Exactly! As long as the sentence ending sounds hot-blooded.

subtitles.original: 吾輩は...
subtitles.english: Wagahai (I) is...

subtitles.original: スッキリ整ったなり！
subtitles.english: I'm feeling refreshed and ready, nari!

subtitles.original: スッキリ整ったなり！
subtitles.english: I'm feeling refreshed and ready, nari!

subtitles.original: シンキングタイムスタートします！始まったぜ！
subtitles.english: Thinking time starts now! It's begun, daze!

subtitles.original: 始まったぜ！始まったぜ！
subtitles.english: It's begun, daze! It's begun, daze!

subtitles.original: どうだ？どうだぜ？
subtitles.english: How is it? How is it, daze?

subtitles.original: なんだ、私も同じくスッキリしたと思うぜ！
subtitles.english: What, I also think I feel refreshed, daze!

subtitles.original: あ、かっこいい！かっこいいぜ！
subtitles.english: Ah, cool! That's cool, daze!

subtitles.original: えーっと、俺もスッキリしたと思うぜ！
subtitles.english: Um, I also think I feel refreshed, daze!

subtitles.original: みんな一緒だ！みんな一緒だな！
subtitles.english: Everyone's the same! Everyone is the same, huh!

subtitles.original: じゃあだめじゃないですか。誰も当てられないぞ、それ。
subtitles.english: Then that's no good. No one will be able to guess at this rate.

subtitles.original: えーっと、なんかもっと特徴とか、どんな時に飲むとか、あるだろう！
subtitles.english: Um, there must be more features, like when you'd drink it!

subtitles.original: いや、うーん。食後かな？食後！
subtitles.english: Well, hmm. After a meal? After a meal!

subtitles.original: 我は...
subtitles.english: Ware (I) am...

subtitles.original: 我？何でちょっと魔王っぽいの？
subtitles.english: Ware? Why do you sound like a demon king?

subtitles.original: 食事時だなぁ！食事時！
subtitles.english: During a meal! During a meal!

subtitles.original: 食事時と食後って言いました？これなんかここらへんが違うのでは？
subtitles.english: Did you say during a meal and after a meal? Maybe this is where it's different?

subtitles.original: 食事中だぜ！
subtitles.english: It's during a meal, daze!

subtitles.original: もちろん食事中にも飲むな、飲むな。
subtitles.english: Of course, I drink it during meals too.

subtitles.original: いやでもね、ラミィもどっちかっていうと食後だぜ、これ。
subtitles.english: But you know, for Lamy, it's more like after a meal, daze.

subtitles.original: 熱血！
subtitles.english: Hot-blooded!

subtitles.original: 勢い飲んだぜ！
subtitles.english: I drank with spirit, daze!

subtitles.original: 固まったな！
subtitles.english: You froze!

subtitles.original: これは、立ち位置変わらなくてもいいのでは？
subtitles.english: Don't you think we don't even need to move positions for this?

subtitles.original: 勢い飲んだぜ！
subtitles.english: I drank with spirit, daze!

subtitles.original: そうなんだ。他に何か？
subtitles.english: I see. Anything else?

subtitles.original: ヘルシーな感じがあるんだぜ。
subtitles.english: It has a healthy feel to it, daze.

subtitles.original: 確かにヘルシーな感じだぜ。でもヘルシーじゃないのもあるぜ。
subtitles.english: It certainly feels healthy, daze. But there's also a non-healthy version, daze.

subtitles.original: へっ？えっ？
subtitles.english: Huh?

subtitles.original: あ、あれ、そらちゃんこっちだぜ。ヘルシーじゃないバージョンもあるぜ。
subtitles.english: Wait, Sora-chan is over here, daze. There's also a non-healthy version, daze.

subtitles.original: これは...ない！ないぜ！
subtitles.english: There... isn't one! There isn't one, daze!

subtitles.original: あんまり思い浮かばないな！
subtitles.english: I can't really think of any!

subtitles.original: これは...これは...きっと...もしかして...
subtitles.english: This is... this is... surely... maybe...

subtitles.original: 今自習移動するか。
subtitles.english: Should we move positions now?

subtitles.original: じゃあ多分、多分大丈夫なんだぜ。立ち位置は大丈夫なんだぜ。
subtitles.english: Then maybe, maybe it's fine, daze. Our positions are fine, daze.

subtitles.original: この立ち位置で。じゃあ、えーっと、終了ってことなんだぜ。
subtitles.english: With these positions. Well then, it's over, daze.

subtitles.original: みんな怪しい方を指すぜーの！
subtitles.english: Everyone, point to the suspicious one, ready!

subtitles.original: 指すぜ！
subtitles.english: Point!

subtitles.original: まぁ、じゃあ、じゃあえーっと、吾輩から。吾輩が怪しいなと思ったのは...
subtitles.english: Well, then, starting with me. The one I thought was suspicious is...

subtitles.original: ラミィちゃんだぜ！
subtitles.english: Lamy-chan, daze!

subtitles.original: 私も同じくラミィちゃんだぜ。
subtitles.english: I also think it's Lamy-chan, daze.

subtitles.original: 同じくラミィちゃんだぜ。
subtitles.english: Same here, it's Lamy-chan, daze.

subtitles.original: ラミィちゃん、ヘルシーって言った、ヘルシーじゃないのはないって。思い浮かばないんだぜ、っていう。
subtitles.english: Lamy-chan said it's healthy, but then said there isn't a non-healthy version. Like she couldn't think of any.

subtitles.original: さぁ、それでは、みんなが何を飲んでいたのか。誰がウルフだったのか。発表だぜ！
subtitles.english: Now then, let's reveal what everyone was drinking. Who was the wolf? Announcement, daze!

subtitles.original: だぜ！
subtitles.english: Daze!

subtitles.original: ドン！
subtitles.english: Don!

subtitles.original:
【 燦鳥ノム 】黒烏龍茶
【 ときのそら 】黒烏龍茶
【 雪花ラミィ 】クラフトボス ブラック
subtitles.english:
[ Suntory Nomu ] Black Oolong Tea
[ Tokino Sora ] Black Oolong Tea
[ Yukihana Lamy ] Craft Boss Black

subtitles.original: 確かにこれは黒烏龍茶にヘルシーじゃないのはないですね。
subtitles.english: Indeed, for Black Oolong Tea, there isn't a non-healthy version.
